from random_word import RandomWords
from quote import quote

r = RandomWords()
w = r.get_random_word()


res = quote(w, limit=1)
words=res[0]['quote'].split()
new_text=""
word_count=0
for word in words:
  new_text+=word+" "
  word_count+=1;
  if word_count==10 or "." in word:
    new_text+="\n "
    word_count=0
print(res[0]['author'],"-\n\n",new_text)
